alert.note: Alert for Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 10 at 4:59PM MDT until April 12 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Montana... Beaver Creek near Hinsdale affecting Valley County. For the Beaver Creek...including Hinsdale...Major flooding is occurring. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Major flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Beaver Creek near Hinsdale. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:30 PM MDT Monday the stage was 17.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest near 18 feet this evening and fall below flood stage Tuesday Night. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 16.7 feet on 05/13/2016. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 600 AM MDT.
